title: How to counter the cane with Teemo
body:
I played Teemo and got the quickest first blood oce on a Nasus but Nasus is so overpowered because he can buy magic resist items and rekt me out of nowhere with his overpoweredness, how do i counter Nasus with this underpowered champion post-6?

Also Nasus' Wither needs more well-defined weaknesses and needs to be a skillshot.

replies.body: Switch it up and Play On-Hit Teemo instead? Get bork, runnans and Frozen Mallet then go tank.

When he tries to stack, blind.

It messes him up real hard.

Repeat process.

Might even level-up Q because of that.
Do as much as you can to deny Nasus farm.

> [{quoted}](name=Slim Chaedi,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=zURwTlYc,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-26T08:13:31.221+0000)
>
> Do as much as you can to deny Nasus farm.

But its not enough, he still kills me even on 40 stacks.
